title.native: ひろがるスカイ！プリキュア

description:
A major incident has occurred in the peaceful Sky Land!? The young Princess Eru has been kidnapped by the monsters of Underg Empire! A brave young girl, Sora, follows the princess through a mysterious hole. "TV"? "Cars"? Are those some kind of magic tools!?!?

But there's no time to be surprised! She has to get the princess back to the castle...! Flying between two worlds! The adventure with the Pretty Cure begins now!

It's hero time!
hashtag: #ひろがるスカイ #ひろプリ #プリキュア #precure

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Makeup
tags.description: Centers around the makeup industry.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Kids
tags.description: Target demographic is young children.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.name: Aviation
tags.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

tags.name: Parkour
tags.description: Centers around the sport of parkour.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Baseball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of baseball.

node.description:
[Official Site](https://erika-fukasawa.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Fukaeri_Comp) 

**Erika Fukasawa** is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/keitamiyoshi)

Keita Miyoshi is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and music producer affiliated with Five Eighth.

**[Website](https://cre8boy.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@CRE8BOY) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CRE8BOY_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/cre8boy/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/CRE8BOY)**

Japanese choreography unit in charge of choreography for many artists and groups such as [AKB48](https://anilist.co/staff/107010) and [Nogizaka46](https://anilist.co/staff/201277).
